mapper.insert: insert into post_message (writer, receiver, title, content, category) values (#{writer}, #{receiver}, #{title}, #{content}, #{category})
mapper.select: SELECT pm.idx, wm.nickname as writer_nickname, rm.nickname as receiver_nickname, pm.title, pm.content, pm.category, pm.result, pm.date_column, pm.writer, pm.receiver FROM post_message pm JOIN member wm ON pm.writer = wm.idx JOIN member rm ON pm.receiver = rm.idx WHERE pm.receiver = #{idx} OR pm.writer = #{idx} ORDER BY pm.date_column DESC

mapper.update: update post_message set result = 1 where idx = #{idx}
